headline: After Hours: Natalie Bencivenga interviews Josh Shapiro
author: Natalie Bencivenga
sentences: Tune in as they discuss fracking, policing, what lessons he’s learned from the work he’s done, and why he says he rejects labels in favor of working towards unity with all Pennsylvanians.
After Hours host Natalie Bencivenga interviews Josh Shapiro, Pa. Attorney General of Pennsylvania, who is running for Governor of Pennsylvania.
